Uses of Interface
nachos.machine.FileSystem

  • Packages that use FileSystem 
    Package Description
    nachos.filesys  
    nachos.machine
    Provides classes that implement the Nachos simulated machine.
    nachos.threads
    Provides classes that support a multithreaded kernel.

    • Uses of FileSystem in nachos.filesys

      Classes in nachos.filesys that implement FileSystem 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RealFileSystem
      RealFileSystem provide necessary methods for filesystem syscall.

    • Uses of FileSystem in nachos.machine

      Classes in nachos.machine that implement FileSystem 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StubFileSystem
      This class implements a file system that redirects all requests to the host operating system's file system.
      Methods in nachos.machine that return FileSystem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileSystem OpenFile.getFileSystem()
      Get the file system to which this file belongs.
      static FileSystem Machine.stubFileSystem()
      Return the stub filesystem.
      Constructors in nachos.machine with parameters of type FileSystem 
      Constructor and Description
      OpenFile(FileSystem fileSystem, java.lang.String name)
      Allocate a new OpenFile object with the specified name on the specified file system.
      OpenFileWithPosition(FileSystem fileSystem, java.lang.String name)
      Allocate a new OpenFileWithPosition with the specified name on the specified file system.

    • Uses of FileSystem in nachos.threads

      Fields in nachos.threads declared as FileSystem 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FileSystem ThreadedKernel.fileSystem
      Globally accessible reference to the file system.
